pr_title: Add a note on MongoDB Panache doc about query on same field

timeline.body:
```suggestion
 * using the same field multiple times in a query is not allowed using PanacheQL as it would generate an invalid JSON
```
timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
             * using multiple times the same field on a query is not allowed using PanacheQL as is it would generate an invalid JSON
          
          
            
             * using the same field multiple times in a query is not allowed using PanacheQL as it would generate an invalid JSON
timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
* using multiple times the same field on a query is not allowed using PanacheQL as is it would generate an invalid JSON
* using the same field multiple times in a query is not allowed using PanacheQL as it would generate an invalid JSON
timeline.author: gsmet
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -85,6 +85,11 @@ * *

*

+ * WARNING: MongoDB queries must be valid JSON documents, + * using multiple times the same field on a query is not allowed using PanacheQL as is it would generate an invalid JSON

timeline.author: gsmet
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -85,6 +85,11 @@ * *

*

+ * WARNING: MongoDB queries must be valid JSON documents, + * using multiple times the same field on a query is not allowed using PanacheQL as is it would generate an invalid JSON + * (see this issue on github: https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/issues/12086).

timeline.message: Add a note on MongoDB Panache doc about query on same field
Add a note on MongoDB Panache doc about query on same field
